title: Baboon development: the older infant, four months to one year (Nairobi Park)
creator_credit: Quentin Brown, Educational Services, Ford Foundation and National Science Foundation
brief_description: Part of a series of films on the baboons of Kenya. Shows without commentary or narration, the growth and development of a baby baboon over one year of its life.
